company_personnel_news.news: MLPoker announces the launch of AI-powered matchmaking, blockchain hand verification, and mobile-first features, setting a new standard for Texas Hold'em in 2025.
Research and Markets releases the 'Gaming Coins Global Market Insights 2025' report, analyzing key players like Decentraland, Axie Infinity, and Sandbox.
Plarium announces the second annual Community Weeks event in RAID: Shadow Legends, engaging their global player base.
Research and Markets publishes the 'Online Gaming Market Size and Share Analysis 2025-2033' report, featuring companies like Activision Blizzard and Tencent.
Research and Markets releases the 'Esports Market Research Report 2025-2029', profiling key players such as Electronic Arts and Tencent.

company_details.name: Malpa Games Ltd
company_details.any_other_details: Malpa Games Ltd, founded in 2022, specializes in publishing casual mobile games. The company has developed popular titles such as 'Word Search Sea' and 'Word Pizza,' each achieving over 20 million downloads and generating more than $10 million in revenue. Their headquarters are located at Spyrou Kyprianou Avenue, Limassol Municipality, Limassol, Cyprus. ([malpagames.com](https://malpagames.com/?utm_source=openai)) The company is led by Director Chrysoula Tzagkidou. ([dnb.com](https://www.dnb.com/business-directory/company-profiles.malpa_games_ltd.bb5c77b6ba4b0553dfa99ab427277e0a.html?utm_source=openai))

final_summary.summary:
### Company Details
Malpa Games Ltd is a Cyprus-based mobile games publisher founded in 2022. The company specializes in casual mobile titles such as 'Word Search Sea' and 'Word Pizza', each with over 20 million downloads and generating more than $10 million in revenue. The headquarters are located at Spyrou Kyprianou Avenue, Limassol Municipality, Limassol, Cyprus. The company is led by Director Chrysoula Tzagkidou.  
[malpagames.com](https://malpagames.com/?utm_source=openai) | [dnb.com company profile](https://www.dnb.com/business-directory/company-profiles.malpa_games_ltd.bb5c77b6ba4b0553dfa99ab427277e0a.html?utm_source=openai)

### Key Personnel
- Aleksandr Sergeev – Head of User Acquisition
- Fedor Krivoblotski – User Acquisition Manager
